body: Hi Mostapha, The folder doesn't exist although ladybug says me **Default path is set to c:/ladybug.** Then I've created it manually and I've found an alike error [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UZ8UQ2FXhhPHuoSr5F1shmkoFsh-bZkMC*1yUvzVpaD80pCaCjtHK3mplT0QUrkSeQZV3Tjckd*vXflLmjEbO-BsaLONM4Xb/error3.PNG)PS: ladybug is still working with the new folder.
